mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, major = #{major}, phone = #{phone}, favorite_1 = #{favorite_1}, favorite_2 = #{favorite_2}, favorite_3 = #{favorite_3}, introduce = #{introduce} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select member.id, member.name, member.age, member.major, member.status, member.phone, member.favorite_1, member.favorite_2, member.favorite_3, member.number_of_project, member.point, member.introduce, mentor.career, mentor.exp, mentor.morality, mentor.positiveness, mentor.reliability, mentor.professional, mentor.leadership from member inner join mentor on member.id = mentor.id where member.id = #{id}

select member.id, member.name, member.age, member.major, member.status, member.phone, member.favorite_1, member.favorite_2, member.favorite_3, member.number_of_project, member.point, member.introduce, mentee.skill, mentee.communication, mentee.responsibility, mentee.performance, mentee.positiveness, mentee.leadership from member inner join mentee on member.id = mentee.id where member.id = #{id}
select member.id, mentor.positiveness as score from member inner join mentor on member.id = mentor.id order by positiveness desc limit 5;
select member.id, mentor.reliability as score from member inner join mentor on member.id = mentor.id order by reliability desc limit 5;
select member.id, mentor.professional as score from member inner join mentor on member.id = mentor.id order by professional desc limit 5;
mapper.update: update mentor Inner join member on mentor.id = member.id set exp = (mentor.exp + #{morality} + #{positiveness} + #{reliability} + #{professional} + #{leadership}), morality = ((#{morality} + mentor.morality) / member.number_of_project), positiveness = ((#{positiveness} + mentor.positiveness) / member.number_of_project), reliability = ((#{reliability} + mentor.reliability) / member.number_of_project), professional = ((#{professional} + mentor.professional) / member.number_of_project), leadership = ((#{leadership} + mentor.leadership) / member.number_of_project) WHERE mentor.id = #{id};

update mentee Inner Join member on mentee.id = member.id set communication = ((mentee.communication + #{communication}) / member.number_of_project), responsibility = ((mentee.responsibility + #{responsibility}) / member.number_of_project), performance = ((mentee.performance + #{performance}) / member.number_of_project), positiveness = ((mentee.positiveness + #{positiveness}) / member.number_of_project), leadership = ((mentee.leadership + #{leadership}) / member.number_of_project) where mentee.id = #{id}
